FuncDef: The reset master-mpu force command forcibly restarts the master main control board.
Examples: Warning: This operation will perform a forcible master/slave main control board switchover or device restart. Are you sure you want to continue? Enter the complete [Yes/No]:Yes
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
If the master main control board is abnormal and the reset slot slot-id or slave switchover command cannot be used, run the reset master-mpu force command to forcibly restart the master main control board.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
